name: UnityCore
description: What is the project about? UnityCore Protocol is a decentralized lending protocol built on Core chain. It is a protocol built on love to unify the entire core ecosystem. It is a protocol where core users can participate as lenders and borrowers. We aim to offer a transparent, and open-source financial service environment. What makes your project unique? Building on Core Chain makes it unique History of your project. A story behind the project is a CEO that has a burden to build a lending protocol that will counter the fake and unreliable lending module that has already been in existence Whatâ€™s next for your project? Bringing the testnet to live in few days time What can your token be used for? Staking, and as borrowing asset.
